section.title: default_checks (integer)
section.para: This parameter determines which of the checks from the sanity module are executed if no parameter was given to the sanity_check function call. By default all implemented checks are included in the execution of the sanity_check function. This can be changed with this value.
Default value is 997. This resolves to the following list of checks: ruri_sip_version, required_headers, cseq_method, cseq_value, cotent_length, expires_value, proxy_require.

section.title: proxy_require (string)
section.para: This parameter set the list of supported extensions for this SER. The value is expected as comma seperated list of the extensions. This list is seperated into single tokens. Each token from a proxy require header will be compare to the tokens from this list.
